title: trainer script should download bugs DB too for models which use commits and bugs
body:
For example, the backout model training is failing:
```
[taskcluster 2019-07-12 07:55:26.247Z] Task ID: IRSmsOB-Qz2OLTmV1CjFmg
[taskcluster 2019-07-12 07:55:26.247Z] Worker ID: i-0a03382fa8fe1dd9a

[taskcluster 2019-07-12 07:55:26.247Z] Worker Node Type: m4.4xlarge
[taskcluster 2019-07-12 07:55:26.247Z] Worker Type: releng-svc-compute
[taskcluster 2019-07-12 07:55:26.247Z] Public IP: 13.52.97.82

Digest: sha256:d9264f421266de62088b96be69b0fe6f3b326794156140633abbcc39ccc549ea
Status: Downloaded newer image for mozilla/bugbug-base:v0.0.66
[taskcluster 2019-07-12 07:55:28.969Z] === Task Starting ===
INFO:matplotlib.font_manager:generated new fontManager
/usr/local/lib/python3.7/site-packages/sklearn/externals/joblib/__init__.py:15: DeprecationWarning: sklearn.externals.joblib is deprecated in 0.21 and will be removed in 0.23. Please import this functionality directly from joblib, which can be installed with: pip install joblib. If this warning is raised when loading pickled models, you may need to re-serialize those models with scikit-learn 0.21+.
  warnings.warn(msg, category=DeprecationWarning)
INFO:scripts.trainer:Downloading commits database from https://index.taskcluster.net/v1/task/project.relman.bugbug.data_commits.v0.0.66/artifacts/public/commits.json.zst to data/commits.json.zst
INFO:scripts.trainer:Decompressing commits database
INFO:scripts.trainer:Training *backout* model
16067 commits were backed out
113549 commits were not backed out
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/usr/local/bin/bugbug-train", line 10, in <module>
    sys.exit(main())
  File "/usr/local/lib/python3.7/site-packages/scripts/trainer.py", line 87, in main
    retriever.go(args.model)
  File "/usr/local/lib/python3.7/site-packages/scripts/trainer.py", line 62, in go
    metrics = model_obj.train()
  File "/usr/local/lib/python3.7/site-packages/bugbug/model.py", line 173, in train
    X = self.extraction_pipeline.fit_transform(X_iter)
  File "/usr/local/lib/python3.7/site-packages/sklearn/pipeline.py", line 387, in fit_transform
    Xt, fit_params = self._fit(X, y, **fit_params)
  File "/usr/local/lib/python3.7/site-packages/sklearn/pipeline.py", line 317, in _fit
    **fit_params_steps[name])
  File "/usr/local/lib/python3.7/site-packages/joblib/memory.py", line 355, in __call__
    return self.func(*args, **kwargs)
  File "/usr/local/lib/python3.7/site-packages/sklearn/pipeline.py", line 716, in _fit_transform_one
    res = transformer.fit_transform(X, y, **fit_params)
  File "/usr/local/lib/python3.7/site-packages/sklearn/base.py", line 553, in fit_transform
    return self.fit(X, **fit_params).transform(X)
  File "/usr/local/lib/python3.7/site-packages/bugbug/commit_features.py", line 210, in transform
    for commit in commits:
  File "/usr/local/lib/python3.7/site-packages/bugbug/utils.py", line 26, in first_iter
    for first, second in iterable:
  File "/usr/local/lib/python3.7/site-packages/bugbug/model.py", line 437, in items_gen
    assert len(bug_map) > 0
AssertionError
[taskcluster 2019-07-12 07:57:31.504Z] === Task Finished ===
[taskcluster 2019-07-12 07:57:31.573Z] Artifact "public/metrics.json" not found at "/metrics.json"
[taskcluster 2019-07-12 07:57:31.649Z] Artifact "public/backoutmodel.zst" not found at "/backoutmodel.zst"
```
